title: Seeing Intermolecular Attractions
subtitle: A very simple interactive with polar molecules on the left and non-polar molecules on the right.
about: All matter is attracted to all other matter. How does this work?
This interactive shows polar molecules (with charges) and non-polar molecules in a
container with each other. Drag molecules around to see how they are attracted to
each other. Dotted lines indicate intermolecular attractions.

textBoxes.text: Drag the molecules close to each other and look for intermolecular attractions.
